title: 11/04/20 HOUR 3- Mark Stein
itunes:title: 11/04/20 HOUR 3- Mark Stein
description:
Mark Stein tells Dan that with all the revenue on the table; that the NBA will more than likely start the week of Dec 22 2020. Mark says that the Lakers and some other teams are not happy about the potential start date, but that teams understand that there is far too much money to lose with a January 2021 start date.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Mark Stein tells Dan that with all the revenue on the table; that the NBA will more than likely start the week of Dec 22 2020. Mark says that the Lakers and some other teams are not happy about the potential start date, but that teams understand that there is far too much money to lose with a January 2021 start date.
